collaborative.title: Gap Scanner API Improvements
collaborative.notes:
### Market Data Cron Jobs - Timeout Fixes (2026-02-18)

**Issue:** London Session and Asia Session cron jobs were timing out due to slow web_search calls

**Solution Applied:**
- London Session: Timeout increased from 180s → 240s
- Asia Session: Timeout increased from 120s → 180s
- Simplified web_search queries to 3 targeted searches per job

**Current Status:**
- London Session: Next run tomorrow 3:00 AM EST
- Asia Session: Next run tonight 7:00 PM EST

**Related:** These jobs post market updates to the dashboard's Daily Reports section

collaborative.title: Create Documents Page for Research & Notes
collaborative.description: Build a dedicated Documents page in the dashboard to store research reports, project briefs, and shared notes between MJ and Juno. This will centralize knowledge and make it easier to reference past research and decisions.
collaborative.notes:
## Documents Page - Research & Notes Repository

### Purpose
Central repository for all research, reports, and notes shared between MJ and Juno.

### Content Types
- Research reports
- Project briefs  
- Meeting notes
- Decision logs

### Integration
- Link from Goals section
- Link from Projects section
- Link from other dashboard sections as needed

### Access
- Both MJ and Juno can add/edit documents
- Collaborative editing supported
- Version history tracking

collaborative.title: Implement AI Agency Architecture
collaborative.description: Deploy multi-agent system with specialized agents on different models (Kimi for operations, Sonnet for coding/writing). Juno acts as VP of Operations supervising specialists.
collaborative.notes:
## AI Agency Architecture

### Overview
Multi-agent, multi-model system with specialized agents reporting to Juno (VP Operations)

### Agents
- **Juno** (Kimi K2.5) - VP Operations, supervision, PR review, coordination
- **KeepLiving-Shopify** (Sonnet 4.6) - Ecommerce automation, product descriptions
- **Content-Creator** (Sonnet 4.6) - Buffer automation, social content

### Key Features
- One API key powers multiple agents (shared rate limits)
- Spawn specialists on-demand (JIT)
- Activity Log monitoring
- PR review workflow

### Document
Full architecture: docs/AI_AGENCY_ARCHITECTURE.md

### Implementation Steps
1. Configure specialist agent definitions
2. Set up model routing
3. Deploy Shopify agent for KeepLiving
4. Deploy Content agent for Buffer automation
5. Test coordination workflow

actionItems.text: Deploy Content agent for Buffer automation
